titleStmt.title: No parliament powder But shot and powder for the Pope. And for all his Cardinalles, Bishops, Abbots, Fryers, Monkes; the maisters and great doctours of Sorbonne. Sent to his vn-holynesse, and them all, for a newe-yeares gift. 1609.
Sac & pieces pour le pape de Romme, ses cardinaux & evesques. English
titleStmt.author: Denakol.

titleStmt.title: No parliament powder But shot and powder for the Pope. And for all his Cardinalles, Bishops, Abbots, Fryers, Monkes; the maisters and great doctours of Sorbonne. Sent to his vn-holynesse, and them all, for a newe-yeares gift. 1609.
Sac & pieces pour le pape de Romme, ses cardinaux & evesques. English
titleStmt.author: Denakol.
Philagathus, fl. 1609.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Purfoot, for Ieffrey Chorleton, and are to be sold at the great north dore of Paules Church,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed with pseudonym: Dena Kol.
Translator's dedication signed with pseudonym: Philagathus.
A translation, by Philagathus, of: Le sac & pieces pour le pape de Romme, ses cardinaux & evesques.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
